text: Santragachhi or Santragachi is a neighbourhood of Howrah city in West Bengal, India. It has a railway station which is a railway junction on the South Eastern Railway. There is a large lake here named Santragachhi Jheel which attracts migratory birds such as lesser whistling duck in the winter months.

Shanivarsanthe/Sanivarsanthe is a small town in Kodagu district in the Indian state of Karnataka. It is one of the towns of Somwarpet taluk, in the north-east of the district. The main crops grown in the area are coffee, paddy and spices. Kannada, Kodava Takk, Tulu, Beary bashe, Hindi and English are spoken by the people.
Bhiloda is a municipality and taluka headquarters situated in Aravalli District in the state of Gujarat in India. It is situated on the banks of the Hathmati River among the Aravalli Hills.

Nangal Choudhary is an important town and tehsil headquarters of District Mahendragarh at Narnaul. It holds the crown of being "First Cyber Village of Haryana". Now it has an assembly seat in Haryana government. Abhe Singh Yadav of BJP is MLA from Nangal Choudhary and it is a Yadav dominated region.

Netrang City is a Hindu People's town in the Netrangtaluka in Bharuch district of the Indian state of Gujarat. Netrang is 20 kilometres (12 mi) away from the city of Netrang, 45 kilometres (28 mi) from Bharuch, the administrative headquarters of the district, 220 kilometres (140 mi) from Gandhinagar, the capital of the state of Gujarat, 320 kilometres (200 mi) from Mumbai, the largest city in India, and around 1,000 kilometres (620 mi) from New Delhi, the capital of India.
